name: new_titles
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool watchmode.
Tool description: Universal OTT Streaming Service Availability API (Netflix, HBO Max, Peacock, Hulu, Amazon Prime Video, AppleTV+, Disney+ & over 100 more)
API description: Get a listing of the title IDs of new titles added to Watchmode within the date range. You can use this to find new titles, then use the /v1/title/ endpoint to get details on the title.

page.description: Set the page of results you want to return, if this isn't set you will always get page 1 returned.

types.description: Filters results to include specific types of titles. Acceptable values are: 'movie', 'tv_series', 'tv_special', 'tv_miniseries', 'short_film'. Multiple types can be passed as a comma-delimited string. Defaults to 'movie,tv_series'.

limit.description: Specifies the number of titles to return per page. The default and maximum is 250. Defaults to 50.

end_date.description: By default, the changes API will return changes since the beginning of yesterday. Populate this parameter to manually set a end date to include changes from a specific date range, format is YYYYMMDD (eg 20210101 for January 1st, 2021).

start_date.description: By default, the changes API will return changes since the beginning of yesterday. Populate this parameter to manually set a start date to include changes from a specific date range, format is YYYYMMDD (eg 20210101 for January 1st, 2021).
